name: Hunt: Primal Reptiles
summary:
An unusual adventure in a jungle full of dangers! The game combines elements of a classic hunting simulator and survival. You traverse a vast, open world full of life and realistic fauna. Apart from many dinosaur species, different dangers await you, such as huge mosquitoes and poisonous plants. You will meet a lot of prehistoric reptiles. From small, agile specimen to powerful giants weighing tonnes.

You will have a huge island from the Cretaceous Period at your disposal. Each traveled meter will be a test of survival! You will find a piece of a basic, random equipment. To survive, you have to conquer the world in search of a better weapon, technology, ammo.

The island, where you are located, is inhabited (In early access, in the future we plan to add more dinosaur) by 5 different dinosaur species. From blood-thirsty Tyrannosaurus to small and agile Velociraptors. Choose your target carefully, find enough ammo, and stuff.
